file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: support+api+documentation@qovery.com
    name: Qovery Product Team
    url: https://www.qovery.com
  description: |
    - Qovery is the fastest way to deploy your full-stack apps on any Cloud provider.
    - ℹ️ The API is stable and still in development.
  title: Qovery API
  version: 1.0.3
  x-logo:
    url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qovery/public-resources/master/qovery_new_logo_white.svg
    altText: Qovery
servers:
- url: https://api.qovery.com
security:
- bearerAuth: []
tags:
- name: Account
- name: Account Info
- name: Admin
- name: Application
- name: Application Actions
- name: Application Configuration
- name: Application Database
- name: Application Deployment Restriction
- name: Application Deployment History
- name: Application Environment Variable
- name: Application Event
- name: Application Logs
- name: Application Main Calls
- name: Application Metrics
- name: Application Secret
- name: Applications
- name: Container
- name: Container Actions
- name: Container Configuration
- name: Container Database
- name: Container Deployment Restriction
- name: Container Deployment History
- name: Container Environment Variable
- name: Container Event
- name: Container Logs
- name: Container Main Calls
- name: Container Metrics
- name: Container Secret
- name: Containers
- name: Backups
- name: Billing
- name: Cloud Provider
- name: Cloud Provider Credentials
- name: Clusters
- name: Custom Domain
- name: Container Custom Domain
- name: Database
- name: Database Actions
- name: Database Application
- name: Database Container
- name: Database Event
- name: Database Main Calls
- name: Database Metrics
- name: Databases
- name: Dependency
- name: Container Dependency
- name: Environment
- name: Environment Actions
- name: Environment Deployment History
- name: Environment Deployment Rule
- name: Environment Logs
- name: Environment Main Calls
- name: Environment Secret
- name: Environment Variable
- name: Environments
- name: Git
- name: Github App
- name: Git repositories
- name: Logical Database
- name: Members
- name: Organization
- name: Organization Main Calls
- name: Organization Api Token
- name: Project
- name: Project Deployment Rule
- name: Project Environment Variable
- name: Project Main Calls
- name: Project Secret
- name: Projects
- name: Referral & Rewards
- name: Container Registries
- name: User Sign Up
paths:
  /organization:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganization
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponseList'
          description: List organizations
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List user organizations
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    post:
      operationId: createOrganization
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: Create organization
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization name is already taken
      summary: Create an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
  /organization/{organizationId}:
    delete:
      description: To delete an organization you must have the admin permission
      operationId: deleteOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    get:
      operationId: getOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: Get organization by ID
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization by ID
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    put:
      description: To edit an organization you must have the admin permission
      operationId: editOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationEditRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: Edit an organization
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization name is already taken
      summary: Edit an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
  /organization/{organizationId}/apiToken:
    get:
      description: List organization api tokens
      operationId: listOrganizationApiTokens
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationApiTokenResponseList'
          description: List organization api tokens
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization api tokens
      tags:
      - Organization Api Token
    post:
      description: Create an organization api token. You can use the generated token
        to interact in a programmatic way with our API.
      operationId: createOrganizationApiToken
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationApiTokenCreateRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationApiTokenCreate'
          description: Organization api token created
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization Api Token name is already taken
      summary: Create an organization api token
      tags:
      - Organization Api Token
  /organization/{organizationId}/apiToken/{apiTokenId}:
    delete:
      description: Delete organization api token
      operationId: deleteOrganizationApiToken
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Organization Api Token ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: apiTokenId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: no content
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete organization api token
      tags:
      - Organization Api Token
  /organization/{organizationId}/member:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationMembers
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/MemberResponseList'
          description: Get members
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization members
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/member/{userId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: User ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: userId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Remove a member
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/inviteMember:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationInvitedMembers
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberResponseList'
          description: Get invited members
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get invited members
      tags:
      - Members
    post:
      operationId: postInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMember'
          description: User invited
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: User already invited
      summary: Invite someone in the organization
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/inviteMember/{inviteId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Remove an invited member
      tags:
      - Members
    post:
      operationId: postAcceptInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invite ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: inviteId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMember'
          description: User invited
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: User already invited
      summary: Accept Invite in the organization
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/transferOwnership:
    post:
      operationId: postOrganizationTransferOwnership
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TransferOwnershipRequest'
      responses:
        "204":
          description: no content
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Transfer organization ownership to another user
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/currentCost:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationCurrentCost
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationCurrentCost'
          description: Get Cost
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization current cost
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCode:
    post:
      operationId: addCreditCode
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationCreditCodeRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: add credit code
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add credit code
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster/{clusterId}/currentCost:
    get:
      description: |
        Get your cluster cost range. We are unable to give a precise cost of your infrastructure at the moment.
        But Qovery guarantees that the cost of your cluster will not exceed the max range.
      operationId: getClusterCurrentCost
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Cluster ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: clusterId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CostRange'
          description: Get cluster cost
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get cluster current cost
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/billingInfo:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationBillingInfo
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfo'
          description: Get Billing Info
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization billing info
      tags:
      - Billing
    put:
      operationId: editOrganizationBillingInfo
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfoRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfo'
          description: Edit billing info
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit Organization Billing Info
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/billingStatus:
    get:
      description: |
        This endpoint returns a "is_valid" boolean field reflecting the billing status of the organization:
        - If true, the organization billing is valid
        - For Startup organization, it returns false if there is at least 1 invoice unpaid since 1 week
        - For Community organization, it returns false if there is no credit left
      operationId: getOrganizationBillingStatus
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingStatus'
          description: Get Billing Status
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization billing status
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceResponseList'
          description: List Invoices
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization invoices
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice/{invoiceId}:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invoice ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Invoice'
          description: Get Invoice
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization invoice
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice/{invoiceId}/download:
    get:
      description: This will return URL of the invoice PDF
      operationId: getOrganizationInvoicePDF
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invoice ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          description: Get invoice PDF
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get invoice link
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/downloadInvoices:
    post:
      operationId: organizationDownloadAllInvoices
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "202":
          description: You will receive an email containing your invoices
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Download all invoices
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCard:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationCreditCards
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardResponseList'
          description: List cfredit cards
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization credit cards
      tags:
      - Billing
    post:
      operationId: addCreditCard
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCard'
          description: Add credit card
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add credit card
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCard/{creditCardId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteCreditCard
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Credit Card ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: creditCardId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete credit card
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/project:
    get:
      operationId: listProject
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectResponseList'
          description: List projects
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List projects
      tags:
      - Projects
    post:
      operationId: createProject
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Project'
          description: Create project
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Project name within the organization is already taken
      summary: Create a project
      tags:
      - Projects
  /organization/{organizationId}/project/stats:
    get:
      description: Returns a list of project ids, and for each its total numberof
        services and environments
      operationId: getOrganizationProjectStats
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectStatsResponseList'
          description: Get number of services
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List total number of services and environments for each project of
        the organization
      tags:
      - Projects
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationCluster
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ClusterResponseList'
          description: List clusters
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization clusters

      - description: Project ID

        in: path

        schema:
          format: uuid

        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List project environment variables
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
    post:
      description: |
        - Add an environment variable to the project.
          - If the environment variable key already exists, then it will be replaced by the new one.
          - If the environment variable value points toward an existing environment variable key, it will be considered as an alias.
      operationId: createProjectEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariableRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Added an environment variable
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add an environment variable to the project
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
  /project/{projectId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:
    delete:
      description: |
        - To delete an environment variable you must have the project user permission
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN variable
        - If you delete a variable having override or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well
      operationId: deleteProjectEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an environment variable from a project
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
    put:
      description: |
        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable
        - For an override, you can't edit the key
        - For an alias, you can't edit the value
        - An override can only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)
      operationId: editProjectEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariableEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Edited the environment variable value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit an environment variable belonging to the project
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
  /project/{projectId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at project level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at project level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createProjectEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the project level
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
  /project/{projectId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to add an alias at project level on an existing environment variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at project level with the same value as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the aliased_variable will be exposed in the "aliased_variable" field of the newly created variable
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias
      operationId: createProjectEnvironmentVariableAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable alias at the project level
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
  /project/{projectId}/secret:
    get:
      operationId: listProjectSecrets
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretResponseList'
          description: List project secrets
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List project secrets
      tags:
      - Project Secret
    post:
      description: |
        - Add a secret to the project.
          - If the secret key already exists, then it will be replaced by the new one.
          - If the secret value points toward an existing secret key, it will be considered as an alias.
      operationId: createProjectSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Added a secret
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add a secret to the project
      tags:
      - Project Secret
  /project/{projectId}/secret/{secretId}:
    delete:
      description: |
        - To delete a secret you must have the project user permission
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN secret
        - If you delete a secret having override or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well  operationId: deleteProjectSecret
      operationId: deleteProjectSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete a secret from a project
      tags:
      - Project Secret
    put:
      description: |
        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN secret
        - For an override, you can't edit the key
        - For an alias, you can't edit the value
        - An override can only have a scope lower to the secret it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)
      operationId: editProjectSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Edited the secret value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit a secret belonging to the project
      tags:
      - Project Secret
  /project/{projectId}/secret/{secretId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at project level a secret that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at project level with the same key as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the overridden_secret will be exposed in the "overridden_secret" field of the newly created secret
      operationId: createProjectSecretOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret override at the project level
      tags:
      - Project Secret
  /project/{projectId}/secret/{secretId}/alias:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to add an alias at project level on an existing secret having higher scope, in order to customize its key.
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at project level with the same value as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the aliased_secret will be exposed in the "aliased_secret" field of the newly created secret
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias
      operationId: createProjectSecretAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret alias at the project level
      tags:
      - Project Secret

      operationId: deleteEnvironmentEnvironmentVariable

        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable
        - For an override, you can't edit the key

        "401":

        "404":
          description: Resource not found

      tags:
      - Environment Variable
  /environment/{environmentId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at environment level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at environment level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createEnvironmentEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId

          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid

          description: Access token is missing or invalid

  /application/{applicationId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:
    delete:
      description: |
        - To delete an environment variable from an application you must have the project user permission
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN variable
        - If you delete a variable having override or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well
      operationId: deleteApplicationEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an environment variable from an application
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable
    put:
      description: |
        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable
        - For an override, you can't edit the key
        - For an alias, you can't edit the value
        - An override can only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)
      operationId: editApplicationEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariableEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Edited the environment variable value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit an environment variable belonging to the application
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable
  /application/{applicationId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at application level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at application level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createApplicationEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the application level
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable
  /application/{applicationId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to add an alias at application level on an existing environment variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at application level with the same value as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the aliased_variable will be exposed in the "aliased_variable" field of the newly created variable
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias
      operationId: createApplicationEnvironmentVariableAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable alias at the application level
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable

    get:

    post:
      description: |
        - Add a secret to the application.
      operationId: createApplicationSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Add a secret
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add a secret to the application
      tags:
      - Application Secret
  /application/{applicationId}/secret/{secretId}:
    delete:
      description: |
        - To delete a secret you must have the project user permission
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN secret
        - If you delete a secret having override or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well
      operationId: deleteApplicationSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete a secret from an application
      tags:
      - Application Secret
    put:
      description: |
        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN secret
        - For an override, you can't edit the key
        - For an alias, you can't edit the value
        - An override can only have a scope lower to the secret it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)
      operationId: editApplicationSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Edited the secret value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit a secret belonging to the application
      tags:
      - Application Secret
  /application/{applicationId}/secret/{secretId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at application level a secret that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at application level with the same key as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the overridden_secret will be exposed in the "overridden_secret" field of the newly created secret
      operationId: createApplicationSecretOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret override at the application level
      tags:
      - Application Secret
  /application/{applicationId}/secret/{secretId}/alias:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to add an alias at application level on an existing secret having higher scope, in order to customize its key.
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at application level with the same value as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the aliased_secret will be exposed in the "aliased_secret" field of the newly created secret
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias
      operationId: createApplicationSecretAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret alias at the application level
      tags:
      - Application Secret

  /container/{containerId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:
    delete:
      description: |
        - To delete an environment variable from an container you must have the project user permission
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN variable
        - If you delete a variable having override or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well
      operationId: deleteContainerEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an environment variable from a container
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
    put:
      description: |
        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable
        - For an override, you can't edit the key
        - For an alias, you can't edit the value
        - An override can only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > CONTAINER)
      operationId: editContainerEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariableEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Edited the environment variable value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit an environment variable belonging to the container
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
  /container/{containerId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at container level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at container level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createContainerEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > CONTAINER
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the container level
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
  /container/{containerId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to add an alias at container level on an existing environment variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at container level with the same value as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the aliased_variable will be exposed in the "aliased_variable" field of the newly created variable
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias
      operationId: createContainerEnvironmentVariableAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable alias at the container level
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
  /container/{containerId}/secret:
    get:
      description: Secrets are like environment variables, but they are secured and
        can't be revealed.
      operationId: listContainerSecrets

        explode: false

        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretResponseList'
          description: List secrets
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List container secrets
      tags:
      - Container Secret
    post:
      description: |
        - Add a secret to the container.
      operationId: createContainerSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Add a secret
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add a secret to the container
      tags:
      - Container Secret
  /container/{containerId}/secret/{secretId}:
    delete:
      description: |
        - To delete a secret you must have the project user permission
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN secret
        - If you delete a secret having override or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well
      operationId: deleteContainerSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete a secret from an container
      tags:
      - Container Secret
    put:
      description: |
        - You can't edit a BUILT_IN secret
        - For an override, you can't edit the key
        - For an alias, you can't edit the value
        - An override can only have a scope lower to the secret it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > CONTAINER)
      operationId: editContainerSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Edited the secret value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit a secret belonging to the container
      tags:
      - Container Secret
  /container/{containerId}/secret/{secretId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at container level a secret that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at container level with the same key as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the overridden_secret will be exposed in the "overridden_secret" field of the newly created secret
      operationId: createContainerSecretOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret override at the container level
      tags:
      - Application Secret
  /container/{containerId}/secret/{secretId}/alias:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to add an alias at container level on an existing secret having higher scope, in order to customize its key.
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at container level with the same value as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the aliased_secret will be exposed in the "aliased_secret" field of the newly created secret
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias
      operationId: createContainerSecretAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret alias at the container level
      tags:
      - Container Secret

          description: If a previous sign up request for the same user has been found,
            the information is returned in the payload
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get Sign up information
      tags:
      - User Sign Up
    post:
      description: Send a Sign Up request containing the user information
      operationId: createUserSignUp
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignUpRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Sign up request stored
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Send Sign Up request
      tags:
      - User Sign Up
